## Cisco-IOS-XR-um-if-bundle-cfg.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)
- [XPaths Deprecated](#xpaths-deprecated)
- [XPaths Added](#xpaths-added)
- [XPaths Removed](#xpaths-removed)
- [XPaths Modified](#xpaths-modified)

### Description

Modified type and primitive-type values for leaf destination under container ipv4. Removed container period-on-bundle due to sysdb path change. Added 800G interface support.

N/A

- (L237)	/{GROUP-BUNDLE}/bundle/load-balancing/hash/src-ip
- (L245)	/{GROUP-BUNDLE}/bundle/load-balancing/hash/dst-ip
